EmailTemplate.name: SW: YPPG Attending PIE, awaiting SW Response
EmailTemplate.subject: YPPG confirmed PIE attendence, awaiting SW response
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi
{!Contact.Name}' has confirmed that they are attending the PIE evening. Please confirm with their Support Worker that they are able to make it or arrange an alternative meeting.
Click on the link to view the record {!Contact.Link}
This is a standard email, sent automatically whenever a YPPG has confirmed that they can attend the PIE but the SW has not yet responded.
